It sounds like you're drawn to intense war dramas! If you enjoy a thrilling narrative and strong performances, I'd highly recommend "Zero Dark Thirty." This film tells the story of the decade-long hunt for Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, featuring an outstanding cast including Jessica Chastain and Joel Edgerton.

Another captivating option is "The Deer Hunter," a classic war film that delves into the profound impact of the Vietnam War on several friends in a small steel town. Starring Robert De Niro and Meryl Streep, it's a powerful exploration of friendship, love, and survival during wartime. Enjoy your movie nights!

If you're interested in a thriller with an international setting, "Proof of Life" might also appeal to you. Russell Crowe stars as a professional negotiator trying to secure the release of his engineer wife who has been kidnapped in South America. Both movies offer engaging plots that might resonate with your preferences. Enjoy the movies!
